title: Literacy and common sense: a year 6 student encounter with print
creator_credit: Open College of Further Education (S. Aust.) and Rick Cavaggion
brief_description: Don Holdaway, noted literacy development educator, gives a lesson in which the children anticipate the words and line endings in a poem. In conversation with Ralph Fairbrother, he relates this to recent research into reading and a “reading for meaning” approach.
